ProjectTitle: A microfluidic platform to screen engineered lasso peptides for therapeutic potential
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/05/2022
6,7. Please note that the KU Leuven policy expects preservation of relevant data for 10 years. Have you considered any specific repositories for data sharing and preservation? You can use KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or domain specific repositories such as those from NCBI or EMBL-EBI (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission); F1000 research also gives a good list of recommendations (https://f1000research.com/for-authors/data-guidelines)
label: good with suggestions
